events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it arrived too small. I would like to request a refund because I need the correct size or my money back.
The customer's issue has been identified as a refund request due to the product not fitting and the desire to return it.
Assigned the case to the returns and refunds specialist team for further handling.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket that arrived too small.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the item has been used or damaged so we can process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 1234567890. The jacket arrived sealed and unused, so it’s in perfect condition except for the wrong size.
Thank you for the info. We will initiate your refund immediately and send you a prepaid return label to send back the jacket at no cost.
That sounds great, thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the prepaid label and the refund process being smooth.
Your refund process has been completed and the return label sent. Please return the jacket within 10 days for full reimbursement.
Just checking in to see if you have been able to send back the jacket using the prepaid label and if your refund was received.
Yes, I returned the jacket last week and the refund showed up in my account yesterday. Thanks for the great service!
We’re glad everything worked out. Closing your case now. Please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
We have sent you a short satisfaction survey regarding your refund experience. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
